CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c), "No Due Date Set", IF(AND(BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c < NOW()), "Due date of a record has passed", IF(AND(BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__Time_Remaining_Percentage__c > 50), "More than 50% of time is remains", IF(AND(BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__Time_Remaining_Percentage__c <= 50), "Less than or equal to 50% of time remains", IF(AND(!BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__closeDateTime__c <= BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c), "Due date met", IF(AND(!BMCServiceDesk__state__c, BMCServiceDesk__closeDateTime__c > BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c), "Due date is not met", ''))))))
CustomField.label: Due Date Progress (Text)
